channel.title: r/rstats - 최근 2시간 글
channel.description: Reddit r/rstats 서브레딧에서 최근 2시간 동안 작성된 글들입니다.

item.title: PLEASE HELP MY PROJECT IS DUE IN 12 HOURS
item.description:
so basically i have data that i want to plot in r studio. however, everytime i put in my code, I keep getting an error message either saying:
(Error in x[floor(d)] + x[ceiling(d)] : non-numeric argument to binary operator) or (Error in hist.default(tandp$streams, xlab = "Streams on Spotify", main = "Distribution of Spotify Streams", : 'x' must be numeric)
even though my values are numeric. I thought the problem was that my values had commas but i removed them and still got the same thing. i am in need of urgent help since my project is due is 12 hours. my values range from 3000-1000000000 so im not sure whats happening. all i’m trying to do is make a histogram or box plot of the distribution but r is not letting me :( if someone wants to run the code to see if they could help PLEASE by all means.
